os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows

name: SecPoshMon
short_description:
This is a server based security monitoring/automation tool built around Windows server and PowerShell.  It will be extensible using content packages which consist of scripts and scheduled tasks.  The default content will provide a framework for PowerShell scripts that will help you monitor the SANS 20 Critical Controls on your network.  

Requires: PowerShell 2.0+ and Windows Server 2008+/Windows Vista+.  Also requires the SecPoSH PowerShell module.
summary: A server based monitoring solution for the SANS 20 Critical Controls
